alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 15 at 10:27PM CST until February 15 at 11:30PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Western Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... Northern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 1130 PM CST. * At 1026 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of South West City to 2 miles south of Gentry to 2 miles north of Westville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Bella Vista... Lowell... Farmington... Pea Ridge... Tontitown... Gravette... Cave Springs... Decatur... Highfill... Gateway... Beaver... Springtown... Hindsville... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 62 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
